name: 推桥面&电报
description: by and for myself. use if you want i guess
additional_info:
fonts used: proxima nova, helvetica,noto sans cjk sc demilight,Frutiger LT Arabic,Noto Sans Devanagari,Arial,sans-serif,Segoe UI Symbol,HanaMinA, HanaMinB;

get noto: https://www.google.com/get/noto/
get hanazono: http://fonts.jp/hanazono/

if u on OS X and cant get proxima nova, change 'proxima nova' in font family to 'Avenir'
